column1: #Text=China is an angry country with a big chip on its shoulder.
#Text=It feels it has not been respected and is not being given its proper place in the international order.
#Text=Add in the fact that China's aging, paranoid rulers use trumped-up nationalism as a way to deflect scrutiny from their own activities and you have a recipe for future conflict.
#Text=The big danger is that this conflict could go from bellicose talk to actual war and this could easily start from a small incident in the South China Sea.
